head.title: Adjust {{FileFormatUp}} pages in {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: {{ProdFullName}} helps you shift {{FileFormatUp}} pages to portrait or landscape. Process PDFs, Word files, Excel sheets, PowerPoint slides, Visio designs, images, archives, and more with control.

header.title: Page alignment for {{FileFormatUp}}
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} enhances {{EnvNameShort}} apps with useful features. Developers can build better solutions by managing file formats and tweaking {{FileFormatUp}} page layouts.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: {{ProdShortName}} Overview
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is built to manage documents in over 50 formats, such as PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, images, and archives. Merge, split, extract, shift, swap, remove, or adjust page layouts as needed.

more_features.title: Adaptable document handling
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} offers a wide range of tools to manage content in 50+ file formats, delivering fast and smooth results.

feature_1.title: Combine various formats
feature_1.content: Merge PDFs, Word docs, slides, spreadsheets, Visio files, images, and archives. Tailor it for the best output.

feature_2.title: Sort document pages
feature_2.content: Relocate, swap, or remove pages to improve your document setup.

feature_3.title: Set page alignment
feature_3.content: Turn pages to an angle or switch between portrait and landscape modes.

feature_4.title: Export pages separately
feature_4.content: Take a page or group of pages and save them as a new file anywhere.

formats.title: Tune pages in many formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} works with 50+ file types, giving you flexible ways to adjust documents.

operations.title: Top features
operations.description: Look at the tools that can improve your projects.

content.title: With [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}), shift {{FileFormatUp}} pages. This feature, plus others, adds reliable document tools to {{EnvName}} apps.

code_1.title: Shift the last {{FileFormatUp}} page
code_1.content: Learn to check the page count in a {{FileFormatUp}} file and adjust its final page.
